articles.description: Riley LaChance swished a 3-pointer from the top of the key with .5 seconds left, giving Vanderbilt an 81-80 win over Mississippi State on Wednesday night.
articles.headline: LaChance's 3 gives Vandy 81-80 win over Mississippi State

images.caption: Mississippi State's Xavian Stapleton puts a finger to his lip silencing the crowd before missing the free throw that sets up Vanderbilt's Riley LaChance's winner with 0.5 seconds on the clock.
images.name: Miss St. player taunts crowd before Vandy's dagger

articles.description: Duncan Robinson drains six 3-pointers, part of an 18-point night in the Wolverines' 74-59 win against the Hawkeyes.
articles.headline: Robinson lights out in Michigan win

images.caption: Duncan Robinson drains six 3-pointers, part of an 18-point night in the Wolverines' 74-59 win against the Hawkeyes.
images.name: Robinson lights out in Michigan win

articles.description: Phil Cofer scored 17 points, Trent Forrest added 16 and Florida State rallied from an 18-point deficit in the second half to defeat 11th-ranked Clemson 81-79 in overtime on Wednesday.
articles.headline: Florida State rallies from 18 down to beat Clemson in OT

images.caption: Florida State takes the lead for the first time in this game off of a fancy spin lay-in from Trent Forrest.
images.name: Florida State takes the lead for first time

articles.description: Kyle Leufroy and Marques Wilson each converted four free throws in the final minute as Lehigh upset Colgate, 88-78 in a Patriot League showdown Wednesday night.
articles.headline: Lehigh knocks Colgate into 2nd place Patriot tie, wins 88-78

articles.description: Mississippi State's Xavian Stapleton puts a finger to his lip silencing the crowd before missing the free throw that sets up Vanderbilt's Riley LaChance's winner with 0.5 seconds on the clock.
articles.headline: Miss St. player taunts crowd before Vandy's dagger

images.caption: Mississippi State's Xavian Stapleton puts a finger to his lip silencing the crowd before missing the free throw that sets up Vanderbilt's Riley LaChance's winner with 0.5 seconds on the clock.
images.name: Miss St. player taunts crowd before Vandy's dagger

articles.description: James Demery and Shavar Newkirk combined to score 39 points to help power Saint Joseph's to a second straight win, 71-55 over Fordham in an Atlantic 10 contest on Wednesday night.
articles.headline: Saint Joseph's wins 2nd straight, sweeps Fordham, 71-55
